xwikidoc.title: JoinTemplate
xwikidoc.content: === Join Planète Sankoré === [[Create an account>>Main.JoinSankore||id="signup" target="_top"]] (% class="disc inside" %) * To create open educational resources * To share under creative commons * To create thematic groups * To participate in communities of interest (% class="disc inside" %) ** by country ** by discipline ** by education level * To evaluate the free resources published * To write your blog and spread * To participate in the palms of the digital
